document.full_text: for many in britain, the upcoming royal marriage is seen less as a rite of renewal and more as a step toward saving a sullied monarchy ' and an uncertain step, at that.
document.title: a royal wedding, a tarnished crown
lines_and_colors: for many in britain, the upcoming royal marriage is seen less as a rite of renewal and more as a step toward saving a sullied monarchy ' and an uncertain step, at that.
